pullRequest.body:
This changes the definition of the quadratic character `ZMod.œá‚ÇÑ` to use ane explicit `match` expression instead of `![0, 1, 0, -1]` (which relied on defeq abuse `ZMod = Fin`), and similarly for `ZMod.œá‚Çà` and `ZMod.œá‚Çà'`.

We also deal with some porting notes,  tidy up some files and speed up `Mathlib.NumberTheory.GaussSum`.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
### PR summary [4bc7ddb0df](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/13737/commits/4bc7ddb0df95367869f4fae69c9759b4becc3892)

#### Import changes

No significant changes to the import graph

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/797de8d4-f090-4212-8908-17448dd2a645) for commit 86f3b9df7b8b0a2f610c370ef7ccc2915f0ab4d8.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/fa42fed3-46bf-40e4-ad3d-23c3b583395c/to/797de8d4-f090-4212-8908-17448dd2a645) against commit 69fa173737cad352d14190dbbf53c8e52909bf02:
```diff
  Benchmark                        Metric         Change
  ======================================================
+ build                            linting         -6.0%
+ ~Mathlib.NumberTheory.GaussSum   instructions   -28.2%
```

```text
General information:
  lint:                                                +2.7113 * 10‚Åπ (+0.0224%)
  build:                                               -21.020 * 10‚Åπ (-0.0172%)

1 file got slower by at least 10‚Åπ instructions:
  Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Category.Cat.Limit:           +1.0899 * 10‚Åπ (+1.07%)

No file got slower by at least 10%.

3 files got faster by at least 10‚Åπ instructions:
  Mathlib.NumberTheory.GaussSum:                       -12.159 * 10‚Åπ (-28.2%)
  Mathlib.Analysis.NormedSpace.PiTensorProduct.InjectiveSeminorm:
                                                       -7.6365 * 10‚Åπ (-2.52%)
  Mathlib.NumberTheory.LegendreSymbol.ZModChar:        -1.7566 * 10‚Åπ (-11.9%)

2 files got faster by at least 10%:
  Mathlib.NumberTheory.GaussSum:                                      -28.2%
  Mathlib.NumberTheory.LegendreSymbol.ZModChar:                       -11.9%
```
I'm afraid this is going to conflict with Ya√´l's PR which removes `AddChar.IsPrimitive` (which is being merge-tested by bors as I write).
... actually less severe than I thought. I have the merge ready + will push it to your branch once the current bors run finishes.
OK. (I think it was `Nontrivial` that was removed, not `IsPrimitive`, but I didn't check carefully yet.)

If I understand the output of the various auto-review scripts, this PR speeds up `GaussSum` by 30% without any change to the functionality. I looked at the code, and it all seems sensible. Great stuff!

maintainer merge
üöÄ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by loefflerd.

Thanks!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9526927245/job/26262957754)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9526927245/job/26262957672)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore/refactor: avoid vector notation in character defs
